action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a city street with a large, historic building featuring a green dome and a clock. There are cars and a double-decker bus on the street, and a modern high-rise building is visible in the background.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a baseball game in progress. A batter in a white and red uniform is swinging at a pitch, while the catcher and umpire are in position behind him. The pitcher is in the background, and the field is surrounded by spectators.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image shows a city street with a large, historic building featuring a green dome and a clock. There are cars and a double-decker bus on the street, and a modern high-rise building is visible in the background.

QUESTION: Is there a baseball game taking place in your image?

QUESTION: Is there a statue on top of the building in your image?
